channel.title: Need help from silabs client
channel.description:
Ok I download the silab client from moparscape download section...anyways when I double click/open up run.bat it opens and says the following below... [code]C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\Local\Temporary Internet Files\Content. IE5\K76N8040.JAVA -Xmx500m -jar cliient.jar 0 0 highmem members 0 ' JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
C:C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\Local\Temporary Internet Files\Content. IE5\K76N8040.pause press any key to continue. . .[/code]
I have no idea whats wrong with it... I have the moparscape client... that works perfectly fine...and I also put "run.bat and client.jar" on the desktop or extract to a folder... so any clues here to help a brother out?

item.title: Need help from silabs client
item.dc:creator: @ViCtORY_FOR_lSU ViCtORY FOR lSU
item.description:
@ViCtORY_FOR_lSU wrote:

Step 1: open “run”
Step 2: right-click it, click “edit”
Step 3: put this in it: JAVA -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0 pause
If that doesn’t work (it should) then go to step 4.
Step 4: set enviromental variables (refer to a guide in tutorials section).
If that doesn’t work, then idk what the hell to do. Hope I helped in one way or another.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help from silabs client

@gurt wrote:

Wait let me restart computer and try…ty for help tho ill pm again if it works
If I could rep u I would :p[br][size=1]Posted on: September 20, 2007, 05:57:15 PM[/size][hr]not working still…I open then it closes the second I open it[br][size=1]Posted on: September 20, 2007, 06:19:27 PM[/size][hr][size=40pt]Help its still not working![/size]

item.title: Need help from silabs client
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Replace your batch file with

JAVA -Xmx512m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0

Read full topic
